statements: SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data;
SELECT person_id, recognition_result FROM face_recognition_data WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data WHERE recognition_result = 'match';
SELECT person_id, timestamp FROM face_recognition_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data WHERE person_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT person_id, timestamp FROM face_recognition_data WHERE recognition_result = 'verified';
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT recognition_result, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM face_recognition_data GROUP BY recognition_result;
SELECT person_id, recognition_result FROM face_recognition_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT image_url, facial_features FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM facial_analysis_results JOIN facial_recognition_data ON facial_analysis_results.image_id = facial_recognition_data.id
SELECT analysis_result FROM facial_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data;
SELECT id, image_url, detection_timestamp FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE detection_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT f.id, f.image_url, a.analysis_date FROM facial_recognition_data f JOIN facial_analysis_results a ON f.id = a.image_id ORDER BY a.analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data
SELECT name, age, gender FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, pattern_type, pattern_strength FROM face_pattern_analysis ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT trend_id, pattern_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT name, age FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_strength FROM face_pattern_analysis WHERE pattern_strength > 75;
SELECT trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE pattern_type = 'Facial Features' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FaceImages;
SELECT face_id, timestamp FROM FaceImages WHERE face_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FaceMatches ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT face_id FROM FaceFeatures WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT face_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM FaceEvents WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT face_id, timestamp, image_data FROM FaceImages WHERE face_id = 1;
SELECT face_id, features FROM FaceFeatures ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM FaceMatches WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY match_time ASC;
SELECT face_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM FaceEvents WHERE event_type = 'login' AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FaceImages JOIN FaceFeatures USING (face_id) WHERE face_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE person_name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT person_name, facial_features FROM facial_recognition_data LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM facial_encodings WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT SUM(statistic_value) AS total_value FROM facial_statistics WHERE statistic_name = 'total_faces';
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE person_name = 'Alice';
SELECT person_name, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY person_name ASC;
SELECT facial_features->'eyes' AS eyes_features, facial_features->'nose' AS nose_features FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT person_name, image_url, facial_features->'hair_color' AS hair_color FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE facial_features->'smile' = true;
SELECT * FROM facial_encodings WHERE encoding IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
